attributes.action: Encourage women to be unselfish and complete pregnancy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many women are having abortions and costing the country too much.  It is only 9 months out of their lives and they can give the child up for adoption.  
Encourage women who do not want to risk getting pregnant (particularly teenagers and young adults unmarried) to ABSTAIN!  Teach them to think logically instead of being overcome by their hormones.  In fact, we adults should model logical and not irrational thinking!
(This is not to condemn those who have done this.  It should not be criminal offense - just deemed an uneducated response to stress of pregnancy - regardless of how it came to be).
